column2: # [[a]] ([[indefinite article|indefinite]] [[w:grammatical article|article]]), any indefinite example of.
# [[bridge]], a structure used to cross a gap or a body of water
# [[bite]] (the wound left behind after having been bitten)
# [[dense]], [[viscous]] or [[thick]] when referring to a liquid or gaseous mass, such as mist
# [[dry]], [[wilted]] (having a relatively low or no liquid content)
# [[degree]], stage of qualifacation or proficiency in a course of study
# [[how much is it|How much is it]]?
# [[am]], [[are]], [[#English|is]] (''present tense, all persons, plural and singular of {{term|wees|lang=af}}, to be'')

# [[kiloohm]]<ref name="EATW">{{term||kiloöhm}} given as the Afrikaans translation of {{term|kilohm|lang=en}} and {{term|kiloohm|lang=en}} [http://books.google.co.uk/books?id=kgVFAAAAIAAJ&q=%22kilo%C3%B6hm%22&dq=%22kilo%C3%B6hm%22&ei=os5kSbi1DI74MObkxLkJ&pgis=1 on page 286] of the '''Engels–Afrikaanse tegniese woordeboek : English–Afrikaans technical dictionary''', by H. J. Terblanche (1976; Nasou; ISBN 062501281X, 9780625012817)</ref>
# [[kingdom]] (nation having as supreme ruler a king and/or queen)
# [[kingdom]] (taxonomic division, below Domain and above Phylum)
# [[goody]]! hah!, used sarcastically to show disapproval, disrepect or contempt
# [[new]] (used to distinguish something recent from something already existing).
# [[what is your name|What is your name]]?
